attributes.description:

Full service history and spare keys.

Reverse camera, touchscreen infotainment system with Apple carplay, Android Auto and Bluetooth, multifunctional steering wheel, cruise control, security system, central locking, airbags, auto folding side mirrors, air-conditioning, power steering, electric windows, anti-lock braking system, electronic brake distribution (EBD).

We offer in-house finance with all major banks.

T's and C's apply.
Errors and omissions Reserved.
